author: Associated Press
title: Ellis Marsalis, Jazz Pianist and Father of Wynton and Brandford, Dies at 85
description: (NEW ORLEANS) — Ellis Marsalis, jazz pianist, teacher and patriarch of a New Orleans musical family that includes famed musician sons Wynton and Branford, has died. He was 85. New Orleans Mayor LaToya Campbell announced Marsalis’ death in a news release Wedne…
content:
(NEW ORLEANS) — Ellis Marsalis, jazz pianist, teacher and patriarch of a New Orleans musical family that includes famed musician sons Wynton and Branford, has died. He was 85.
New Orleans Mayor LaToya Campbell announced Marsalis’ death in a news release Wedn… [+4583 chars]
